title: NEW YEAR'S EVE BLACK & WHITE BALL
desc: Sleek Events is proud to announce the return of the New Year's Eve Ball.? Making its return to the legendary venue at the Proud Bird near LAX, we invite you to come celebrate this signature event as we ring in 2016.? Los Angele's ultimate evening of celebration, great food and dancing as we culminate the events of the year during our signature opening speech and king and queen crowning. Thursday, December 31st experience a formal evening like no other.? Enjoy the majestic night while sipping your favorite cocktail with friends to make the night the most memorable experience in style, elegance and unmatched energy.? ???????????????
